abstract.t: This documents provides background for the work on VoIP peering andtries to provide guidance on what kind of work is needed tofacilitate widespread SIP-based peering of telephony networks. It isintended to spur discussion on the work about peering (in theSPEERMINT and DRINKS WGs) and should also serve as input to theongoing discussions on reducing Spam for Internet Telephony (SPIT).
